ModMetaData.name: Energy Tab
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy
ModMetaData.description:
Shows useful information about the generation and consumption of energy in the settlement. Doesn't depend on technology and is compatible with existing saves. The author of the original mod is Fluffy - prise him. (https://github.com/fluffy-mods/ColonyManager). Cut off, sewed up, corrected, modified and designed - Glucocorticoid (https://github.com/Glucocorticoid/EnergyTab_SK)
[Russian]
Показывает полезную информацию о генерации и потреблении энергии в поселении. Не знависит от технологий и совместим с существующими сохранениями. Автор оригинального мода - Fluffy (https://github.com/fluffy-mods/ColonyManager). Обрезал, зашил, исправил, доработал и оформил - Glucocorticoid (https://github.com/Glucocorticoid/EnergyTab_SK)
